emailTemplate.subject: Assessments AutoSubmit Job Failure Notice
emailTemplate.message:
The Assessments AutoSubmit job encountered errors during processing and had to skip ${failureCount} attempts/submissions. The remaining attempts/submissions were processed successfully.
Manual intervention may be required to correct these issues. For further details, see the logs.
emailTemplate.messagehtml:
The Assessments AutoSubmit job encountered errors during processing and had to skip ${failureCount} attempts/submissions. The remaining attempts/submissions were processed successfully.

Manual intervention may be required to correct these issues. For further details, see the logs.
